links.*: Of the Ruin of Beleriand and the Fall of Fingolfin

wikitext.*:
'''''faug''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word, meaning "gape".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''gape''</ref> In context, it also carries the meanings "gasping", "choking", and "thirst".

==Examples==
* ''[[Anfauglir]]'' - "Jaws of Thirst"<ref>{{S|Beren}}</ref>
* ''[[Anfauglith]]'' - "Gasping Dust"<ref>{{S|Fingolfin}}</ref>
* ''[[Dor-nu-Fauglith]]'' - "Land under Choking Ash"<ref>{{S|Index}}, ''Dor-nu-Fauglith''</ref>
